greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of orbits of order k under doubling map which remain in a semicircle, with k dividing n.
formula: Apparently T(n, k) = Sum_{j=0..n-1} 2^floor(n*j/k), for 0 <= k <= n - 2 with T(1,0)=0. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 16 2021
results.author: Francois Maurel (maurel(AT)sequoia.ens.fr)
